welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Horsell, where rich history meets modern charm. Explore our quaint streets, indulge in our famous fish and chips, and soak in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport is the only terminal and serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to military flights and operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lasham Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers with exclusive facilities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport caters to VIP and business travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
